website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you prefer a natural nasal spray that will produce near-instant results and don't mind the temporary stinging feeling that occurs.
pros: An all-natural spray that is formulated with horseradish, wintergreen, and cayenne pepper extract
Many repeat users rave about how quickly it works on stuffy noses
In addition to allergies, it also helps relieve headaches and congestion
cons: Causes a burning sensation in the nose for about 30 seconds after spray
Relief may only last a few hours for some users, requiring more frequent doses than others sprays on our list

customer_reviews.title: It works, not as good as sinus buster, not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: It works but not as well as sinus buster. These homeopathic sprays do not work for everyone but aside from a short but painful experience, what do you have to lose besides $10-15? For the crybabies who complained that these sprays did not work for them is why sinus buster is no longer available. Via a class action lawsuit, the crybabies got thier $10 and the lawyers got thier thousands. For the rest of us who gained relief from years of dealing with cronic allergies and sinus congestion, we got screwed. If it doesn't work for you then just ask for a refund. Let the rest of us continue to use what works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: So the first question you ask yourself is does it work? Yes it does. Clears me right up. The next question is why would someone want to spray hot pepper up your nose? does it burn? Well go get a wooden match and lite it then stick the sucker up your nose, yes it burns. But it only last for about 30 to sixty seconds then when it stops you can wipe the tears out of your eyes. I am addicted to afrin and wanted to try something natural and so far this stuff works. So if you can handle a little fire up your nose give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: R. Verdin

customer_reviews.title: Nose spray addict
customer_reviews.text: I was complete addicted to a generic Affrin nose spray, I relied on it twice a day or more everyday to be able to breathe. I read that this was great go over come the rebound congestion and it was. I used this instead of my regular spray for three days and haven’t needed my other nose spray or this since. Yes it does burn but it is not unbearable and only burns for a second. This stuff is magical and all I will ever use for a nasal spray now since it is non addictive and does not cause rebound congestion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mucus emanicipator
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works.Do not use while driving unless you can see through a veil of tears(the good,sinus draining kind). If you have ever been punched in the nose, you will be prepared for the sledgehammer effect that kind of makes the entire world stop for a split second. edit- I tried rinsing with Alkalol(diluted of course) after this and they really compliment each other-- "Excellent mucus removal Mr.Plumber,Sir!" "I could not have done so without your gracious assistance Mr.A!"
customer_reviews.author: the king

customer_reviews.title: Burns like demon piss
customer_reviews.text: If I were searching for a product that made my sinuses bleed, eyes water, and burn like a demon pissed in the bottle, then this would get five stars. It actually causes congestion and a headache instead of relief from them. This product is terrible! Being in law enforcement for 10 years, I've been purposely and accidentally pepper sprayed about a dozen times; this product burns about the same and induces the same nasal flow response. Then it's right back to be congested again, only with a horrible taste in your mouth. Highly do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jrl51

customer_reviews.title: No help what so ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff not only didn't help my stuffy nose, it actually made it worse. Bought it because of reviews, however this stuff doesn't work. I have deviate septum, so need to open passage way to help breathe better, this stuff only burns your nostrils and doesn't improve breathing. I also bought Sinex with my order, that stuff works very fast and actually opens your nostrils and allows you to breathe. I through it out, tried it several times just to be sure....garbage. Maybe use it for self defense, you can squirt it like pepper spray.
customer_reviews.author: CONCERNED USER

customer_reviews.title: Vasomotor rhinitis? Gut up and get some!
customer_reviews.text: I have vasomotor rhinitis. When the weather changes to drastically outside with high or low pressure, I spend the entire day sneezing because my sinuses cannot adjust. I tried this product after I had eaten a bunch of hot wings am I sneezing went away. So I was curious about the capcacin element. This stuff works. It provides me three to four hours of relief. There are no rebound effects as with afrin or similar products. Yes it is true that I will briefly cry from the sensation but it is totally worth it to avoid the 300 sneezes I would have had to suffer through the next 3 to 4 hours. Gut up and get some!
customer_reviews.author: Vince F.

customer_reviews.title: Was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Ok, I finally received a bottle I could use. I am so sad.... I was hoping so much that this would work. I've tried it several times now and each time it made my nose even more stuffed. The first time I sprayed it, it brought me to my knees! OMG! that was insane! But I used it again hoping it would work... no luck. I am so disappointed! First experience: I had to return the first one because it looked like the bottle leaked. I'm going to try to order again and see if it will be better the second time. I'm anxious to try this product, so hopefully it will come with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny865

customer_reviews.title: Not good for nasal polyps but works on congestion little pain no gain
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK FOR NASAL POLYPS. Will clear congestion but thats it. Back to the afrin . If you use it once and clear your sinuses the next timd gour clogged up like me 5 minutes later it literally burns the inside of your nose LIKE HE. LL. HAD TEARS AND A SHOOTING HEADACHE. My 2nd sinus surgery polyps came back thought this might help I was wrong good concept though IF ITS ONLY CONGESTION GO FOR IT THIS WILL DO THE TRICK IF YOH DONT MIND A LITTLE BURN.
customer_reviews.author: abba

customer_reviews.title: Marginal value
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened to Sinus Buster, but, I bought this as a replacement and it's not nearly as effective :-(
customer_reviews.author: TheBretz

customer_reviews.title: Must try for sinus relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic sinus issues for years. Sinus headaches which trigger migraines, pressure, ear pain and fullness. Despite trying Zyrtec, Allegra, Sudafed, Flonase, Astelin, and xyzal I would get no long-term relief. Recently I began having dizziness and severe migraines. Saw a neurologist, ENT doctor and allergist. No resolution or new insight. I found Sinus Plummer, ordered it with little confidence of working but to my surprise it works wonders. It burns like hell but relieves my symptoms within minutes. It also helps my dizziness. I have one in my purse at all times and one at home. Definitely a must for sinus suffers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works AMAZING for my sniffly boyfriend! Try this now for your sinus problems!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend suffers from daily allergies. They are awful and especially effect his sinuses. He sniffles all day long! I can tell that is not fun for him to deal with. I recommended buying this and he did so right away. He has been using for several weeks now and let me tell you... the stuff works AMAZING!!! He doesn't sniffle at all now! This, combined with an allergy pill daily, has changed his life. The allergy pill alone did nothing for his sinuses. This spray changed everything. It isn't exactly enjoyable to use and it does burn. But it only lasts a few minutes and then you get to enjoy clear sinuses for around 24 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the ORIGINAL Sinus Buster - this product doesn't cut it
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out, but leaning toward even less stars. For me, doesn't compare to the original Sinus Buster that I can no longer find. This seems like a watered down version. It does help for only a short duration
customer_reviews.author: A. Atta

customer_reviews.title: no addiction and no rebound congestion
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Initial burn and tears goes away after a short while followed by some relief. I've used Sinus Buster years ago and heard this is the closest thing you can get these days. Unfortunately, relief doesn't last nearly as long as Afrin or other pharma types, but at least it's not constrained with addiction and rebound congestion. For me, even after a single use, Afrin gives me faucet nose, so I have to counter with saline spray all day. Now, I can saline here or there, but not worry about rebound or addiction.
customer_reviews.author: 杨杰夫

customer_reviews.title: HOT Dang!!!!!  That's GOOD Stuff!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Sinus Buster junkie for years...suddenly, I can't find it or businesses are out of it...so I tried this stuff. WOW!! Personally, I find it more potent than Sinus Buster. It does what SB does, clears my sinuses, obliterates headaches in 30 seconds, it's awesome. But be warned, you'd better brace yourself before using it the first time. I thought my brain had burst into flames:) Ahhh, but the relief. GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: MikeL

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly on my "hard-to-shake" sneezing fits
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a homeopathic remedy and I know "they" say those don't work, but I beg to differ. When I get a sneezing fit that nothing else can touchj, just a couple of snorts of this stuff quiets me down immediately. I used to use Sinus Buster but I guess that got taken off the market. This is a suitable alternative for me. It's very hot and I could see sensitive people having trouble with it but for me it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Spicy, but effective
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic sinus infections forever and make the mistake of getting hooked on Vicks Sinusex. It works, but I have ended up in a bad cycle of rebound congestion during my second pregnancy. I got this to combat it, and I have to say it works pretty well. I'm knocking off one star because it does burn for about two seconds going in. The post nasal drip is also a little spicy if it goes down the back of your throat. But the upside is that is works, and is holistic. Worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Sinus Buster
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for my old trusty Sinus Buster, and found this was the new version. It goes right through your brain lol feel the burn! It makes my nose run, but I look for that to start some clearing. I have chronic sinus issues and use this plus saline when having episodes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen DeGennaro

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was using Afrin 2 or 3 times a day and I couldn't breathe without it. I was having rebound congestion and read that the only way to get rid of it was to wean myself off of Afrin using a non chemical nose spray. I was hopeful this would work, but Sinus Plumber did not clear my stuffed up nose. It did make me sneeze a few times which loosened up mucus that I could then blow out. But it didn't leave me breathing clearly like the Afrin did. I'll also add that the pain is NOT as bad as everyone is saying.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Tinnitus fixed for now!
customer_reviews.text: So I just got Xclear which is also a wonder product. I feel like sinus plumber works. Its like pepper spray into your nose. It works after the fact. It gives you congestion immediately but then clears you out for a longer period than xclear. One thing it did is it cured a tinnitus issue I’ve been having for a week+. Amazing!!! I hope it lasts. I have bad allergies. Xclear + sinus plumber + Flonase seems to be the ticket!
customer_reviews.author: dude123292

customer_reviews.title: Burns and smells/tastes gross, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: Well first, let me say that I was skeptical, but this product worked for me. I was using afrin for 5 months, several times a day... couldn't breathe through my nose without it. First, I used a nasal saline rinse to clean out my nasal passages, then I used the nasal plumber. Burns like hell and tastes/smells gross, but it worked. I used it Thurday evening a couple times and Friday morning a couple times and haven't had to use anything since. My sense of smell and taste are coming back little by little. I would recommend this product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Afrin for months now and really need to stop using it, so I found this product and thought I would give it a try. The reviews were great, so I was hopeful it would work for me. After the first few sprays, I got an intense burning sensation. It really was awful. Then after waiting a few minutes, my nose actually became even more stuffy. I gave it a few more tries, but every time my nose became more stuffy after each use. This product, unfortunately did not help whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: KellyK

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible.
customer_reviews.text: It's like macing the inside of your face. Does it hurt? Yea. On the best sprays it just made my eyes water from the burn. On the worst sprays it felt like being punched in the face (those sprays were when it hit a raw spot inside my nose though). It does help clear the sinuses. It doesn't clear it for long but the relief is nice. Idk if it'll work better if I used it daily because I'm hesitant to use it that often due to the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Teache

customer_reviews.title: Quick relief for Migraines and Cluster Migraines!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, if your looking for quick relief of Migraines, or what I get Cluster Migraines, this is it. You just have to get past the initial burn but it only last's a few seconds, and is definitely worth it. I've never experienced pain like the head pains I get where they last 2-15 days, every month. I've been ordering Sinus Plumber for months now, I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: eggs12

customer_reviews.title: Great relief from sinus pain/pressure
customer_reviews.text: Amazing produce for sinus pressure relief. My ENT doctor recommended this after I started being able to feel barometric pressure changes in my nose and sinuses after sinus surgery. I’m able to get immediate relief from sinus pain/pressure when using this spray. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sillygrinch

customer_reviews.title: It BURNS!
customer_reviews.text: If you can get past it burning the inside of your nose then this is the product to buy. I woke up out my sleep with the right side of my face in pain from sinus pressure. My nose was stuffy my ear had pressure so I used it and with in seconds I could hear and feel it breaking up. The pressure and stuffiness was gone and I could rest. AFTER THE BURNING stopped of course.
customer_reviews.author: Talu

customer_reviews.title: KICKS LIKE A MULE THEN SOOTHES LIKE A GENTLE RAIN
customer_reviews.text: If you want pain and then relief for your sinuses, then try this spray!!! When my sinuses are dry or if I have a sinus headache (I usually have them together) then a couple of sprays of will do the trick. And it's nice to know it all natural, I did some damage with the doctor issued steroid sprays!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Luker

customer_reviews.title: Wowza!  Clears sinus area nicely!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this product for years. I’ve been scared of it or putting anything up my nose. I had a stuffy nose for about a month, hubby said I was snoring horrible. Not sure if allergies or the end of a cold, but I was also very phlegmy and couldn’t cough it up. I gave in and tried the spray. Wowza! I’m a believer in this product! I placed an order for 2- replaced his and one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am so happy to find a non-drug nose spray that works! Wards off my migraines, too. It doesn't work as well as Afrin, but I don't mind since it's a natural product and can be combined with other strategies. It's so great to have a non-drug option out there. I was "addicted" to Afrin after a sinus problem I had. This helps me wean off. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've had chronic sinusitis for decades. This product is great. It burns a bit at first but you get used to it guickly. I have mostly problems with congestion in the sinuses in the forehead which neti pots and Navage DO NOT touch, so this is the first thing I ever found to clear those sinuses. It has helped prevent sinus infections several times. I love it and will always use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Works 100% as stated. I have been off of OTC nasal sprays for 90 days
customer_reviews.text: Works 100%. Small pinch when you first use it, But well worth it. I was accustomed to using generic nasal sprays 4-7 times a day, almost year round. I got tired of my sister nagging me about it so I tried this. I've used this 4 times in 3 months. I never feel like I need to go back to the cheap, somewhat habit forming nasal sprays. No side effects for me. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Midcoast MINI

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've had terrible allergies for years. Nose is always running. Tried prescription and over the counter drugs without much success. This will stop my nose running almost instantly. Only downside is I have to use it several times a day and it definitely has a strong burn, but worth it to shut off the constant dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Beegs Barley

customer_reviews.title: Increases sinus inflammation after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: After you get over the initial shocking burn, which you'd expect from spraying horseradish up your nose, which is about 30 sec, like they say, you get about 3 hours of wonderful relief. Your passages remain open and drain well. Hours 4 through 18, however, I was far worse off than before I started. It appears that my nasal passages had recovered enough from the initial shock to become inflamed about being sprayed with pepper.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who has chronic sinus issues. He tried it today and was amazed that it opened his sinuses and relieved his headache right away while nothing else has. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jalexa1024

customer_reviews.title: had no impact
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Phenylephrine spray products for years at night before bed and have always hoped to find something to help me stop using them. This product really shocks my sinuses, but does not reduce the internal swelling and does not help me breathe easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schofer

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it feels like I'm breathing through a straw but this didn't help
customer_reviews.text: Ouch. This hurts. I guess I've never used it while my nose is totally blocked so I can only say that if your nose is feeling dry and it's hard to breathe through it, this doesn't help for that. Perhaps it works if you're trying to clear a blocked nose. Sometimes it feels like I'm breathing through a straw but this didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best rapid decongestant I've ever found. I used to be able to buy this in local stores, but they stopped carrying it. It's more expensive here, but nothing else I tried worked even half as well as this. This breaks down congestion, helps reduce headaches, and doesn't spike blood pressure. A++
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This product is fantastic! Yes, it does burn like the devil but what do you expect when you look at the ingredients? The uncomfortable sensation does not last long. I use Flonase twice daily but was still experiencing sinus headaches daily. I bought this product and the first time I used it I was hooked. You would think that there would not be a whole lot of swelling to be reduced if I faithfully use Flonase but it actually opened up other areas in my sinuses. I will be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McElaney

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had worked
customer_reviews.text: This nasal spray has such good intentions, but it is not meant to be for me. It is quite intense when you first spray it, which I could deal with, but it didn’t do me any good. It cleared my nose for a minute and then I was all stuffed up again. I wish it had worked as I would so much rather use a natural spray that burns a bit then synthetic chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Should banned, caused severe pain
customer_reviews.text: Instant searing pain! I haven't felt pain like this since a severe infection when my doctor prescribed me opioids... Are you kidding me, this stuff should NOT be on the market And no, it did NOT help my symptoms at all
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does something, but doesn't clear sinuses.
customer_reviews.text: Has a strangely pleasureable burn that makes you feel like you're about to open your nose for the next 5 years. Unfortunately, there is no follow-through. Feels nice for a minute or two, but doesn't actually improve sinus congestion (for me at least).
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: This product really works.  Just like the bottle states.
customer_reviews.text: I do not leave home without this stuff. I have turned so many people on to this product, so much so, that I should get some free. I have a bottle in my handbag, overnight bag, tote bag, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joncee

customer_reviews.title: does relieve a sinus headache
customer_reviews.text: I've had a sinus infection all week, been on antibiotics since Tues PM. The Sinus Plumber spray does relieve a sinus headache. It did not make my snotty congestion disappear, but it did help open things up for a while. The burn is not as bad as I expected. Over the counter stuff like Sudafed/Dayquil doesn't really do much for me, and I like the idea of a spray to put the medicine where the problem is.
customer_reviews.author: MsC

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: It clears the sinuses. Yes it hurts, but after you are done you will feel like you saw God, or at least have clearer sinuses. If you have chronic sinus congestion...buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Had High Hopes
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY REALLY wanted this product to work against my rebound congestion, as I’ve found myself addicted to 4 Way nasal spray (like Afrin. I’m sure the product does work for people who aren’t addicted to nasal sprays but a lot of the marketing has been pushed towards people who are struggling with a nasty nasal spray addiction, and so far it has not worked. I truly had the highest of hopes and am sad myself to post this.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It stings, but it works
customer_reviews.text: It just cleans you out and makes it easier to breath and smell. Be warned, the first minute is like biting into something hot, but in your nose haha. But if you are looking for a non-steroid nasal spray, this really does the trick, at least for me. I had super bad congestion after a week of drinking and swimming in the ocean, and this helped me get back to normal, sans congestion headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sigman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works great for allergies but does nothing for my headaches. This works better than Sinol for allergies but Sinol works better for my headaches (weird).
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Whoever recommended you try this... you will hate them, then thank them
customer_reviews.text: I've got an allergy that only pops up for 2-3 weeks a year (russian olive pollen) that no over the counter drug seems to combat. So a friend recommended this. Let's be clear, IT BURNS. But then I'm good for a few hours as if there was no allergy. So yeah, i'm pretty psyched about this little bottle of self-inflicting pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Burns so good
customer_reviews.text: Cleared out my sinuses immediately. Be aware, does burn, but works incredibly and I do not get a tolerance to the product like I have in the past with other sinus sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: About 70% as effective as Afrin
customer_reviews.text: This sort of works similar to Afrin, except that it is not as good. It doesn't work 100% of the time, but mostly works. However, unlike Afrin, this is a safer option with no rebound effect which makes it usable for long term problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Great for post nasal drip
customer_reviews.text: I have done my research on Capsaicin and post nasal drip reading clinical studies. After usinf this product I think it has really helped my chronic post nasal drip.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Snapp

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I had used Sinus Blaster in the past, but can no longer find it. This seemed close, but I was still skeptical. It works great and keeps me clear all night so that I sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Wingrider

customer_reviews.title: Still searching
customer_reviews.text: Like others who have written reviews, I struggle with nasal congestion. Hoping to find a natural alternative to the OTC nasal sprays, I tried Sinus Plumber. My nasal passages laughed and said "nice try." It did nothing for me, so the search continues...
customer_reviews.author: DL Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh. Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do that much. Burns a little and clears a little. I have really bad sinuses though. Most likely made for average sinus issues
customer_reviews.author: JimBoB The Great

customer_reviews.title: Great quick relief
customer_reviews.text: It works. Burns for a second an then the sinuses open and and the pressure comes off. Only complaint is it doesn't last that long, maybe an hour or two, but it is a quick fix if your head is killing you.
customer_reviews.author: Steveh

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Sinus Buster spray until they discontinued it. Unfortunately, this replacement for it isn't as strong and doesn't help me as much as Sinus Buster did.
customer_reviews.author: Farelenore

customer_reviews.title: Nosebleed from hell
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for a couple days, in initially I was hopeful, I got over the momentary discomfort but it didn't really seem to be working. Then it caused a nosebleed so severe that I nearly had to go to the hospital. My nose bled like hell for more than two hours, wouldn't stop for anything, bathroom looked like a slasher film had been made there.
customer_reviews.author: S G

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Feel the burn!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite preventative! If I feel a sinus infection, cold, or flu bug coming on, I use this once or twice a day. It does burn, but if you can tolerate it, it's so worth not getting sick! Oh, and it clears your sinuses too!
customer_reviews.author: barbara tully

customer_reviews.title: works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I would not be without this stuff, it may burn when you use it for a few moments but the pressure release is great
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works well, but it does knock you back a bit after using. We migraine sufferers are tough people, but sometimes this stuff is a little hard to take with the pepper. I highly recommend this product, but only to those who consider themselves strong. It's not for the weak people, they won't use it after the first try.
customer_reviews.author: LAP

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately didn't really work for me
customer_reviews.text: Clears out the sinuses a little but doesn't unstuff my nose very much. However, it doesn't hurt really. I'm surprised anyone would say it feels like being punched in the nose. I'm assuming those people have never been punched in the nose.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: See You Later Cluster Headaches
customer_reviews.text: My husband suffers from cluster headaches. Nothing he has tried, besides oxygen therapy, has worked. He used this shortly into his last cluster headache and he immediately yelled about how bad the product smelled and felt, but the headache went away within minutes! If you suffer from cluster headaches, give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Brittny L. Knittel

customer_reviews.title: Call your Sinuses Plumber to snake out your cleanouts!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic nasal spray! Let the Plumber snakes out your sinuses! Must have..
customer_reviews.author: Steven G. Matchinske

customer_reviews.title: Should Be Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product does nothing more than a saline nasal spray would do. It is nothing like Sinus Buster which I used for years & was trying to replace. Either mine was defective, or the company uses false advertising. Very disappointed in the product, and also in Amazon because they would not allow me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Esther C.

customer_reviews.title: Pain Reliever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products for sinus, Trigeminal and/or cluster headaches....this product has helped me enormously to deal with pain...
customer_reviews.author: BeadyEyed

customer_reviews.title: I have stopped taking Sudafed. This helps a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I have stopped taking Sudafed. This helps a lot with my congestion and post nasal drip. I think Sudafed is the reason for my high blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Tray

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to Sinus Buster
customer_reviews.text: I used Sinus Buster for years for my allergy-induced sinus headaches. Now that SB is no longer available, I decided to try this. It actually seems slightly more effective, and the price is roughly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray. Clears sinuses fast. I use all winter. Does make eyes water sometimes, but worth it
customer_reviews.author: LBM

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Awful stuff and didn’t work. Thought it would work like the unavailable nowadays Jalapeño nose spray that worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Snowy living

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't measure up
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be as good as the Sinus buster but it is not. The one thing that stands out is there is some kind of fragrance added to the formula which gave me a headache. The spray cap is also kind of flimsy. Overall, I will not be buying this one again
customer_reviews.author: ruby_777

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing results
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for me. I was looking to relieve the congestion high up in my sinuses, and this didn't have any impact. It's probably more effective for lower sinus congestion? Anyways, don't let the "burn" comments scare you off- they're exaggerated in my opinion. It's relatively mild.
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Only product that has ever cleared my sinus-generated ear aches, not just my sinuses!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it stings -- but no more than eating hot chili does. If you can tolerate Mexican food, this nasal spray is more than worth its momentary sting. And, because its effect goes up along the nerves, it is the only nasal spray that unstops my ears as well as my nose. I've always had minor ear aches during allergy season -- which is most of the year in California -- but Sins Plumber clears the ears too!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Not too hot!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for my mom. She had radiation for skin cancer on the outside of her nose, for some reason because of the radiation her nose is always stuffy now, it's still swollen in there and may be for some time still, but this clears it up quickly and makes it so that she can sleep at night!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Aaaaagh it burns! I knew what was in it, but WOWSA! It didn’t take away my stuffiness. It’s a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: Instantly relieves my migraines
customer_reviews.text: No amount of prescription pain meds compare to instant relief this brings. Have been a loyal customer from early days and dont go anywhere without it. First few times you use, it will burn...its pepper/garlic up your nose....but gets easier with each use.
customer_reviews.author: yuliya goldenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great for sinusitis
customer_reviews.text: Ok. This is really good product to help with my blocked sinuses. It works great. I wish if it was a bit cheaper...
customer_reviews.author: Attila

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. It will even knock out a sinus headache and sometimes a vascular headache all while clearing your head. I can't tolerate decongestants so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Roger1969

customer_reviews.title: Relief again!!
customer_reviews.text: After they took Sinus Buster off the market I wasn’t sure what I was going to do as that was the only thing that helped my sinuses. Then I found sinus plumber and my sinuses are happy again and so am I! It’s especially helpful during cold/flu season and during allergy season. It works great for me! So worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: I used to be able to buy this stuff at my local Walgreens this stuff DOES work fast like they say it does BURN for only a sec or 2 but it has kept me from having to go home from work. Saving me hrs. It works that good.
customer_reviews.author: jsmilam1

customer_reviews.title: Rapid relief
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I don’t know why it cost so much. Provides effective rapid relief if you can surpass the dirt 10 seconds of burning sensation.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Burns so good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff burns like a mofo, but man does it work. I'm a terrible allergy sufferer and have been using it through the end of the winter/beginning of spring with no ongoing sinus problems. A real life saver.
customer_reviews.author: RachelleB

customer_reviews.title: I love this nose fire so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this nose fire so much. Beware....this is not for the weak. I'd been trying to kick my Afrin habit for a while, and a few days of squirting this stuff, and I'm good and clear. Sinus Plumber isn't habit forming so I'm free and clear of nose sprays!
customer_reviews.author: TK Yarb

customer_reviews.title: Works for sinus pain
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Suffered from sinus pain on and off for years. When I feel it coming on, this stops the pain from progressing to unbearable. Yes it burns a little but it goes away quickly. I always have this on hand. I used sinus buster and find this very comparable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief without rebound congestion (for once)
customer_reviews.text: Stings for a second or two, but immediate relief...you do not become dependent on this product like you would with Afrin or Sinex because of the lack of nasty chemicals (I.e. oxymetalozine). Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Grant R

customer_reviews.title: SAFE AND EFFECTIVE!
customer_reviews.text: WORKS! No mind bending chemicals that make you feel detached from your body! WORKS AND WORKS! SAFE!
customer_reviews.author: Madremo

customer_reviews.title: I can breathe now
customer_reviews.text: This product works like great. It does have a 30 sec of wow punch to it but overall I would recommend this product to all with sinus issues
customer_reviews.author: Book worm 4 kindle

customer_reviews.title: Clean sinuses
customer_reviews.text: Does burn sinuses but they say... no pain no gain.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: It is broken
customer_reviews.text: It came broken. Leaked out, box wet. I do not want to return it, I want a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S

customer_reviews.title: The "big guns" of headache nasal sprays
customer_reviews.text: As you would expect, this stuff burns. But it works - immediately. Very powerful combination of ingredients. The only weakness is the same as with any other nasal spray - it may not always give you sustained relief. Either way, it seems perfectly safe to just use it again when the headache comes back. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: CRich

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had some serious sinus issues for a number of years, relating to dental work I needed and eventually got. What was left to handle was the chronic sinus difficulties. This product has helped incredibly to ease things and my sinuses are finally on the mend. I must say, it burns like hell for about 25 seconds, then all good!
customer_reviews.author: jaye

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: It does burn some like others have stated but it completely cleared my sinuses when nothing else would.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than medicinal stuff with nasty chemicals if you can stand the sting. I for one enjoy the rush. It cleans sinuses right out blowing my nose in a tissue. I used to use Synol until I discovered they use a preservative called Benzalkonium chloride rumored to harm nasal passages.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it was just like Sinus Buster
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be like Sinus Buster. Not ever close.
customer_reviews.author: gnbksleep

customer_reviews.title: Good product, terrible damaged product!
customer_reviews.text: I give the product 5 stars because it has helped me with my allergies but the packaging was terrible. I had to return it and bought it at a health food store.
customer_reviews.author: AVRANCHGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Not only was it ineffective, but it caused the sinus congestion to become worse.
customer_reviews.author: MisterShabby

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Yes it burns , is not as bad as I was expecting but it didn’t work at all for my rhinitis at all. Sad .
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This will definitely open up your sinuses. I try not to use it too much, but it works when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat effective
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as Sonus Buster-but who can afford that? It works adequately.
customer_reviews.author: babsby

customer_reviews.title: Feel the Burn!
customer_reviews.text: It took courage to do this to my nasal passages. However, the burn is better than enduring the relentless allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Used to use Sinus Buster made with hot peppers which worked very well on any sinus congestion. But it got taken off the market by some ridiculous lawsuit. This product is very similar. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RD
